techmeme.title: IDC: global shipments of PCs reached 64.9M units in Q2 2024, up 3% YoY; Apple's shipments rose 20.8% YoY, the biggest jump among global PC makers (Harshita Mary Varghese/Reuters)
Anthropic now lets developers use Claude 3.5 Sonnet to generate, test, and evaluate their prompts, and adds new features, like generating automatic test cases (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Google will make its dark web monitoring feature available to all users for free in late July 2024, no longer requiring a Google One membership to access it (Damien Wilde/9to5Google)
Microsoft hikes the price of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate by $3 to $20/month for new subscribers and plans a Standard tier for $14.99/month without day-one titles (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Filing: Evolve Bank & Trust says that the personal data of at least 7.6M people was accessed during a February 2024 ransomware attack by LockBit (Carly Page/TechCrunch)
